p:
AG6 mice (6–8 weeks) were infected by ZIKV intrapleural injection (100 pfu per mouse). The infected AG6 mice were administered 200 mM NaHCO 3 solution in regular drinking water
33, 34 . One hour before urine collection, the AG6 mice were intragastrically administered 500 µl of 200 mM NaHCO 3. Mouse urine was collected by abdominal pressing.
